title: 旧约 - 诗篇(Psalms) - 第 58 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 诗篇(Psalms) -- 第 58 章 ( 本篇共有 150 章 )

lineList.en: Do ye indeed speak righteousness, O congregation? do ye judge uprightly, O ye sons of men?
lineList.cn: （大卫的金诗，交与伶长，调用休要毁坏）世人哪，你们默然不语，真合公义吗。施行审判，岂按正直吗。

lineList.en: Yea, in heart ye work wickedness; ye weigh the violence of your hands in the earth.
lineList.cn: 不然，你们是心中作恶。你们在地上秤出你们手所行的强暴。

lineList.en: The wicked are estranged from the womb: they go astray as soon as they be born, speaking lies.
lineList.cn: 恶人一出母胎，就与神疏远。一离母腹，便走错路，说谎话。

lineList.en: Their poison is like the poison of a serpent: they are like the deaf adder that stoppeth her ear;
lineList.cn: 他们的毒气，好像蛇的毒气。他们好像塞耳的聋虺，

lineList.en: Which will not hearken to the voice of charmers, charming never so wisely.
lineList.cn: 不听行法术的声音。虽用极灵的咒语，也是不听。

lineList.en: Break their teeth, O God, in their mouth: break out the great teeth of the young lions, O LORD.
lineList.cn: 神阿，求你敲碎他们口中的牙。耶和华阿，求你敲掉少壮狮子的大牙。

lineList.en: Let them melt away as waters which run continually: when he bendeth his bow to shoot his arrows, let them be as cut in pieces.
lineList.cn: 愿他们消灭如急流的水一般。他们瞅准射箭的时候，愿箭头彷佛砍断。

lineList.en: As a snail which melteth, let every one of them pass away: like the untimely birth of a woman, that they may not see the sun.
lineList.cn: 愿他们像蜗牛消化过去，又像妇人坠落未见天日的胎。

lineList.en: Before your pots can feel the thorns, he shall take them away as with a whirlwind, both living, and in his wrath.
lineList.cn: 你们用荆棘烧火。锅还未热，他要用旋风把青的和烧着的一齐刮去。

lineList.en: The righteous shall rejoice when he seeth the vengeance: he shall wash his feet in the blood of the wicked.
lineList.cn: 义人见仇敌遭报，就欢喜，要在恶人的血中洗脚。

lineList.en: So that a man shall say, Verily there is a reward for the righteous: verily he is a God that judgeth in the earth.
lineList.cn: 因此，人必说，义人诚然有善报。在地上果有施行判断的神。
